3: Should I be calling you Chrome or Smith, Cap?
Chro... no, call me whatever you want. I decide to what, and to whom, I respond.
Sounds nice, hehe.
Relaxed by Kamui's laughter, Chrome laughs too.
Haha.
Hahahaha.
Hahahahaha.
The riot of laughter sounds surprisingly crisp.
I live in an incredible world... surrounded by incredible people.
Hey, Chrome, we're heading outside.
Wait up. I'll come with you!
And me too...
You guys, you never intended to wait for my command, did you?
Time is of the essence. Can't afford to wait for the official go-ahead. Kamui taught us that.
Leave me out of it! Hey, Wanshi, say something!
Oh... uh, well, I just want to go home and hit the sack, so...
If you're going to slack off, at least be discreet about it...
So what about you, Leader? Are you staying behind to work on that weird report system? Or are you coming with us?
Now that you mention it, I'm gonna start tinkering with this weird system, and you guys will wait for me to finish.
Oh, come on!
You're abusing your power!
An order is an order!
Bonded polymers.
Exhausted people.
Even so. Despite so. What Langston went through and what Strike Hawk managed to piece together—
Chrome.
Not the best solution.
This is my conclusion.
